name: 陳雅玫
objective:
This course is designed primarily to enhance graduate students’ reading, listening and speaking skills through natural and authentic English, contextualized in lively, interesting situations related to students’ immediate needs. At the end of the course, students are expected to be able to comprehend wrritten and spoken English and to engage in meaningful discussion at the intermediate or 
upper-intermediate level. 
。

scorePolicy:
1. attendance & participation (出席與參與): 12%
   2. weekly quizzes on the assigned readings (每週閱讀文章小考): 40%  (= 4% x 10 weeks)
   3. monthly exams: 36%
   4. final role playing: 12%
